alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 16 at 12:54PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. Lake Granby will increase releases due to the higher inflow. * WHERE...Along the Colorado River between Willow Creek and the Little muddy Creek in north central Colorado, including the following county, Grand. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1245 PM MDT, emergency management reported the river is running high in the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas along the Colorado River from Willow Creek to the Little Muddy Creek
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Stay away or be swept away. River banks can become unstable and unsafe.
